ygData.subject: Re: Sister Isle..........
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info. One more question, since I am KOS at the dock should I bind myself at the dock in FP so I can gate back to sell etc? ... From: Barry
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info.
One more question, since I am KOS at the dock should I bind myself at the
dock in FP so I can gate back to sell etc?
----- Original Message -----
From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
To: 'EQ_Necromanceronelistcom' <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, December 13, 1999 09:30 AM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Sister Isle..........


> From: Barry Senowitz <BarryS@...>
>
> Well first off, you are not kos in all of freeport, i think it is just
near
> the paladin and cleric guild. I always go the nro to freeport way to get
on
> boat and never have had a problem, but you can stand on the dock all day
> long and no npc will bother you. DE's have a deal with the freeport
militia
> that is why we can walk freely around (for the most part).
>
> Once you get on the boat, sister island is the first stop. I hunted there
a
> lot at your level and made quite a bit of money :) My favorite spot to
set
> up on the island looks like a little tear drop coming off the island where
> none of the sisters go, so I could always med or pull to this area with no
> problem. As soon as the boat turns and is lined up the edge of the island
> on the right, I would jump off the boat and swim to this point and
commence
> with the slaughtering. You are kos to the people at the dock, so stay
away.
>
> Vanelin Blackheart
> 34th DE Nec - Povar
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Hu Anderson [mailto:as4603rosand@...]
> Sent: Monday, December 13, 1999 9:24 AM
> To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Sister Isle..........
>
>
> From: "Hu Anderson" <as4603rosand@...>
>
> I am a lvl 13 DE necro and was wanting to make a trip to the Sister Ise in
> OOT. My question is how hard of a trip is this for a DE to make, am I
KOS
> in Freeport etc. Also is the isle the first one that the boat stops at or
> will I have to swim? Any other advice will also be welcomed :)
>
>
> Shadoewalker
> lvl 13 Necro Brell
>
> This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
> tolerated
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
